checkKey() - Method in class Graphics.GraphWin
Returns the most recent key pressed, or null if no key press has occurred since the last call to getKey() or checkKey.

Graphics - package Graphics
Graphics is a Java port of John Zelle's graphics.py module.
GraphicsObject - Class in Graphics
This is the base class for all graphics objects.
GraphicsObject() - Constructor for class Graphics.GraphicsObject
Create a GraphicsObject.
GraphWin - Class in Graphics
Represents a window on the screen where graphical images may be drawn.

Creates a window for drawing into, with autoflush set to true.
